pkgmetadata.longdescription: # scrapyx-stormproxiesStormproxies middleware for Scrapy (http://scrapy.org/)Required-------- python version >= 2.7Install--------Checkout the source and run python setup.py installOr pip install scrapyx-stormproxiessettings.py----------- # Activate the middleware STORMPROXIES_ENABLED = True # The Stormproxies URL STORMPROXIES_URL = 'http://x.x.x.x:13080' DOWNLOADER_MIDDLEWARES = { 'scrapyx_stormproxies.StormProxyMiddleware': 610, }
